Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not after); 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before)
Name: Cup
Description: Relatively tall cup with a ring base and thinned lip. The clay is coarse, composite (with a high percentage of carbonate particles), and has been polished. Furthermore, it has been overfired and is therefore red. Exceptionally, it does not bear any decoration.
